meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of an adult in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The young deer had an adultlike grace as it leaped through the forest.
meanings.sent2: She admired the adultlike way he handled the difficult situation.
meanings.sent3: The puppy tried to imitate the adultlike walk of the older dogs, but ended up tripping over its own paws.
meanings.sent4: The child's adultlike determination to finish the puzzle impressed everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: Her adultlike confidence shone through as she gave the presentation.

meanings.definition: To behave in a mature or responsible manner.
meanings.sent1: He tried to adultlike by taking care of his younger siblings when his parents were away.
meanings.sent2: It is important to adultlike when making decisions that affect others.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly told her friend to adultlike and stop procrastinating on their homework.
meanings.sent4: The team needed to adultlike and work together to achieve their goal.
meanings.sent5: As a leader, it is crucial to adultlike in times of crisis.
